summary: This is my remake of the hireling Belrand who resides at the Winking Skeever in Solitude. I only changed the way he looks, including the shape of his face, eyes, hair, and I added warpaint, but I did not change anything else such as skills, perks, etc.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Belrand by CrimsonFairy~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[URL=http://minus.com/lJmOT0paomcWX][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jJmOT0paomcWX.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is my remake of the hireling Belrand who resides at the Winking Skeever in Solitude. I only changed the way he looks, including the shape of his face, eyes, hair, and I added warpaint, but I did not change anything else such as skills, perks, etc. I didn't really like his other look and didn't think it suited him well, so I thought I'd change him and this is what I came up with. :) Hope you guys like him, enjoy!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements/Recommended
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Required:
The standalone male version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]. It looks like this: ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0.
The latest Skyrim patch 1.8.


The mods I list below are the ones you'll want if you want the look in the screens. The first section of mods I list are the ones I used, the second are the ones MissMorose used in her shots, and the third is the ones Kamikazekossori used.

Recommended:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by Urshi[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363]Beards[/url] by Hvergelmir.
Iridum Eyes by Halendia. (File currently not available)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498]High Quality Eyes[/url] by Xenius.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784]High Resolution Scars[/url] by Xenius.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411]Brows[/url] by Hvergelmir.
I also used the light version of eyebrows from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971]Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents[/url] in some images.

MissMorose used:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by Urshi[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodians Scars[/url] by Gizmodian and Xenius.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21451]HQ Eyebrows - vanilla texture replacers[/url] by regnbagar.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620]HQ Beards - vanilla texture replacers[/url] by regnbagar.
[Dark Versions for both of these mods]

Kamikazekossori used:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better Males[/url]. (Not safe for work)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam.

ENBs used:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23812]Seasons of Skyrim ENB True HDR[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]PINEAPPLEVISION ENBs[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4577]ENBPM - Atmospheric ENB Series[/url].

Other mods used:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130]HN66s Earrings[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277]Omegared99 - Armor Compilation[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29815]Wanderer Cuirass by Frank and Cabal[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Install/Uninstall
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. It shouldn't ask you to overwrite anything. And that's it! If you use UFO then I think you're supposed to load follower mods under the UFO.esp in order for UFO changes to affect them.

To uninstall, go into the Skyrim Data folder and delete Belrand by CrimsonFairy.esp and then go to Meshes, actors, character, FaceGenData, Facegeom, Skyrim.esm and delete 000B9981.NIF. Then go back to the Skyrim data folder and navigate to Textures, Actors, Character, FacegenData, FaceTint, skyrim.esm and delete 000B9981.dds and 000B9981.tga.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bethesda for making Skyrim and the Creation Kit.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]Apachii[/url] for letting me use one of her amazing hair styles.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379]TairenSoul[/url] for letting me use her awesome warpaint.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5531736]MissMorose[/url] for testing and taking screenshots.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1409267]Greyblood[/url] for testing.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/209736]Kamikazekossori[/url] for testing and taking screenshots.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3697422]Bryan244[/url] for testing.

And the Nexus creators and staff for their awesome work and website.

Please let me know if I forgot someone! I'm pretty sure I got them all though.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage/Permission
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
If you want to do something with my mod (as in, translating or uploading it somewhere) then you'll have to get permission from me first. If I give you my permission then you'll be directed to a couple other people you'll have to get permission from as well.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs/Incompatibilities
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I don't know of any bugs so far, and there shouldn't be any since I only changed his appearance and didn't mess with anything else, but please let me know if you find any! He probably won't be compatible with any other mods that change his appearance.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Other follower mods by me:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27620]My Onmund replacer[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28862]Azalea Follower[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32564]Talvas Fathryon Remake[/url].


[URL=http://minus.com/lTiBGtYZaqF5C][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jTiBGtYZaqF5C.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


Thanks for reading, downloading, commenting and endorsing! :)
author: CrimsonFairy
